T02D2495:254a-1: ga na tsa kra bi dhi pr'a ka sa n'a ma /
T02D2495:254b-0: @254b tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i cho ga rim par phye ba zhes bya ba /
T02D2495:254b-1: rje btsun ma 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2495:254b-2: dpal ldan bde chen rgyal po yi //
T02D2495:254b-3: rdo rje sems dpa' phyag 'tshal nas //
T02D2495:254b-4: dngos grub dgos pa kun sgrub pa'i //
T02D2495:254b-5: tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i rim bshad bya //
T02D2495:254b-6: de la tshogs kyi 'khor lo brgya rtsa 'am 'bum
T02D2495:254b-7: la sogs pa byed par 'dod pas 'byor pa dang
T02D2495:254b-8: bstun pa'i rim pa ni gsum ste /
T02D2495:254b-11: rnal 'byor pa'i rim pa lta bus bya ba'o //
T02D2495:254b-12: dang po ni 'byor pa dang ldan pas rgyud gang
T02D2495:254b-13: dang rtog bsre mthun pa'i rnal 'byor pho mo lha
T02D2495:254b-14: grangs dang mnyam pa rang gi slob dpon sngon du
T02D2495:254b-15: 'gro ba'i blo can rnams kyis de'i cho ga dang
T02D2495:254b-16: / brda dang phyag rgya la sogs pa tham snyoms 'jug gi bar du bya ba ni gcig ste /
T02D2495:254b-17: rim par phye ba dang po'o //
T02D2495:254b-18: gnyis pa ni ji ltar tshogs pa'i 'byor pa dang /
T02D2495:254b-19: ji ltar rigs pa'i rnal 'byor pho mo rnams rdo rje slob dpon sngon du 'gro bar bya ste /
T02D2495:254b-20: cho ga ni rgyud kyi dbye ba las shes te /
T02D2495:254b-21: de lta bu'i bya ba gcig tu 'dod de rim par phye ba gnyis pa'o //
T02D2495:254b-22: gsum pa ni 'byor pa dang ldan pas rgyud du
T02D2495:254b-23: ma'i rnal 'byor pa rang gi rig byed la mkhas
T02D2495:254b-24: pa'i tshogs la spro ba dang bsdu ba'i rim pas
T02D2495:254b-25: bya ste / de ltar rnal 'byor pa'i grangs ji
T02D2495:254b-26: snyed pa de snyed tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i dbye ba
T02D2495:254b-28: 'di ni rim par phye ba gsum pa'o //
T02D2495:254b-29: de thams cad la gnas dang rdzas dang /
T02D2495:254b-32: yon bdag la bar chad med par bya'o //
T02D2495:254b-33: grangs du ma bya bar 'dod pas tshul 'dis ni yongs su shes par bya'o //
T02D2495:254b-34: tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i cho ga rim par phye ba
T02D2495:254b-35: zhes bya ba a'a ts'arya he ru ka badzras mdzad
